Gabriel Poça Gabriel Poça's Blog https://gabrielpoca.com en-us <%= Enum.map sort_by_date(get_collections("post") ++ get_collections("music")), fn post -> %>
<%= post[:metadata][:title] %> <%= url_for(post[:output_file]) %> <%= url_for(post[:output_file]) %> <%= pub_date(post[:metadata][:date]) %>
<%= include(post[:input_file], %{layout: nil}, subscribe: false) %>

<% end %>
